title: Log into Goog (wait 2-3 days)typed in all old info correct: verify email code comes but Pg freezes
content: I'm recovering an old Google account and I've already had to wait 2-3 days verify who I am I have typed in the right old password the right old email the right backup code and number I get the verification email sent to my new email and then when I go to put that in weather click on the browser or not the page will not load or move at all like the verification page just doesn't have a link that follows it- what the shit
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device
